About

I usually create beautiful web applications using Sass and JavaScript. I have a BA in Emerging Media and Communication from UT-Dallas.

I am currently drinking coffee and building web apps @ Kalkomey in Dallas, Texas.

Other possible activities: running, attending NBA games, playing video games, reading autobiographies by comedians or politicians, eating delicious food in Texas, or traveling for yummy food outside of my home state/country.
